name: Markets.com
tag_list: markets, markets-com, business-news, business-video, financial-news, financial-videos, wall-street
overview:
Markets.com provides its users the latest news on market movers, company profiles, macroeconomic country analysis, personal finance, and one-on-one interviews with CEOs.

On Markets.com, users find the latest headlines from the worldâ€™s most trusted media outlets. The website is an interactive web portal where visitors can click on their preferred news source (i.e. Marketwatch, CNN Money, CNBC) to see a list of its most recently published stories, rather than visiting each sourceâ€™s website. Markets.com also embeds video stories from major news wires like Reuters, the Associated Press (AP), and the New York Financial Press (NYFP), in addition to the siteâ€™s interactive company profiles and industry news. The site also includes sections dedicated to personal finance, investor education, and small business advice.
